What is Organic Blue Lotus Flower Herbal Tea?

Organic Blue Lotus Herbal Tea is crafted using the pristine petals of the exquisite blue lotus flower, renowned for its enchanting aroma, vibrant blue hue, and rich historical significance. It is believed to have been revered in ancient Egypt and is still cherished today for its potential therapeutic benefits and calming effects.
